# Abstract
There are many articles on how to extend the capabilities of Apache Hive with the use of custom UDFs (User Defined Functions). This article will focus on how to create a UDF in the Scala programming language. Once we create the UDF, we will test it on the Hortonworks Sandbox 2.4.

## Environment
Intellij IDEA 2016
Oracle Virtual Box
Hortonworks Sandbox 2.4

### Let's get started...
The first thing we need to do is create a class in Scala.
